articles.author: Haresh Menghani
articles.title: Gold price stands tall near record high, around $2,300 amid geopolitical risks - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold prices (XAU/USD) touched a fresh record high, around the $2,300 mark, during the Asian session on Thursday and remain well supported by a combination of factors.
articles.content:
• Gold price ticks lower amid some profit-taking near the all-time peak set this Thursday.
  • The uncertainty over the Fed’s rate-cut path weighs on the USD and should lend support.
